byline: David Gura, Jeremy Hobson, David Brancaccio, Jonathan Zittrain and Katie Long
teaser: As a manhunt for one of suspect in the Boston Marathon bombings intensifies this morning, authorities are asking residents of Watertown, MA., and other towns nearby to stay in their homes. And French Finance Minister Pierre Moscovici joins us to discuss the state of the French economy, the euro zone, and austerity.
